Tooth Extraction.title: Introduction
Tooth Extraction.content: hi Elvis, Troublesome tooth? Tooth extraction removes damaged or decayed teeth. It’s done in your dentist's office with local numbing. This prevents pain and infections, keeping your mouth healthy

Tooth Extraction.title: Reason for Extraction
Tooth Extraction.content: Teeth are extracted for various reasons, including severe decay, infection, or damage from trauma.
Tooth Extraction.audioText: Teeth are extracted for various reasons, including severe decay, infection, or damage from trauma.

Tooth Extraction.title: Benefits of the Procedure
Tooth Extraction.content: Removing a decayed tooth can prevent the spread of infection and alleviate pain.
Tooth Extraction.audioText: Removing a decayed tooth can prevent the spread of infection and alleviate pain.

Tooth Extraction.title: Risks Involved
Tooth Extraction.content: Though rare, risks include infection, bleeding, and dry socket.
Tooth Extraction.audioText: Though rare, risks include infection, bleeding, and dry socket.

Tooth Extraction.title: Procedure Overview
Tooth Extraction.content: The procedure involves numbing the area, loosening the tooth, and then extracting it. Recovery typically takes a few days.
